mil5.1.7:1.3_0: Puna ca parinibbānasamaye subhaddena paribbājakena pañhaṁ puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.1.7:1.4_1: asuñño loko arahantehi assā’ti, asesavacanametaṁ, nissesavacanametaṁ, nippariyāyavacanametaṁ.
mil5.1.7:1.6_2: tena hi ‘asuñño loko arahantehi assā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.1.7:1.8_0: ‘asuñño loko arahantehi assā’ti, tena hi ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda,
mil5.1.7:1.8_1: vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.1.7:1.9_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gahanatopi gahanataro balavatopi balavataro gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro, so tavānuppatto,
mil5.1.7:1.9_1: tattha te ñāṇabalavipphāraṁ dassehi makaro viya sāgarabbhantaragato”ti.
mil5.1.7:2.4_1: bhagavato vacanaṁ nānatthañceva hoti nānābyañjanañca, ayaṁ sāsanaparicchedo,
mil5.1.7:2.4_2: ayaṁ paṭipatti paridīpanāti dūraṁ vivajjitā te ubho aññamaññaṁ.
mil5.1.7:3.1_0: Api ca, mahārāja, mā te pucchā moghā assa,
mil5.1.7:3.1_1: rasato te saṁsanditvā kathayissāmi ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda,
mil5.1.7:3.1_2: vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti yaṁ bhagavā āha,
mil5.1.7:3.1_3: taṁ khayaṁ paridīpayanto sesakaṁ paricchindi, ‘vassasahassaṁ, ānanda, saddhammo tiṭṭheyya,
mil5.1.7:3.3_1: bhagavā evaṁ vadanto saddhammassa antaradhānaṁ vā vadeti abhisamayaṁ vā paṭikkosatī”ti?
mil5.1.7:3.6_1: puriso naṭṭhāyiko sabbasesakaṁ gahetvā janassa paridīpeyya ‘ettakaṁ me bhaṇḍaṁ naṭṭhaṁ, idaṁ sesakan’ti.
mil5.1.7:3.7_1: bhagavā naṭṭhaṁ paridīpayanto sesakaṁ devamanussānaṁ kathesi ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda,
mil5.1.7:4.1_0: Yaṁ pana parinibbānasamaye subhaddassa paribbājakassa samaṇe parikittayanto āha—
mil5.1.7:4.2_1: asuñño loko arahantehi assā’ti, paṭipattiparidīpanā esā,
mil5.1.7:4.2_2: tvaṁ pana taṁ paricchedañca paridīpanañca ekarasaṁ karosi.
mil5.1.7:4.3_0: Yadi pana te chando, ekarasaṁ katvā kathayissāmi,
mil5.1.7:5.1_1: taḷāko bhaveyya navasalilasampuṇṇo sammukhamuttariyamāno paricchinno parivaṭumakato,
mil5.1.7:5.1_2: apariyādiṇṇeyeva tasmiṁ taḷāke udakūpari mahāmegho aparāparaṁ anuppabandho abhivasseyya, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil5.1.7:5.1_3: tasmiṁ taḷāke udakaṁ parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyyā”ti?
mil5.1.7:5.6_0: Yadi tattha buddhaputtā ācārasīlaguṇavattapaṭipattimeghavassaṁ aparāparaṁ anuppabandhāpeyyuṁ abhivassāpeyyuṁ.
mil5.1.7:5.7_2: imamatthaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṁ,
mil5.1.7:6.1_1: mahati mahāaggikkhandhe jalamāne aparāparaṁ sukkhatiṇakaṭṭhagomayāni upasaṁhareyyuṁ, api nu kho so, mahārāja, aggikkhandho nibbāyeyyā”ti?
mil5.1.7:6.2_1: bhiyyo bhiyyo so aggikkhandho jaleyya, bhiyyo bhiyyo pabhāseyyā”ti.
mil5.1.7:6.3_1: dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā jinasāsanavarampi ācārasīlaguṇavattapaṭipattiyā jalati pabhāsati.
mil5.1.7:6.4_1: taduttariṁ buddhaputtā pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatā satatamappamattā padaheyyuṁ,
mil5.1.7:6.4_4: evamidaṁ jinasāsanavaraṁ bhiyyo bhiyyo ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ tiṭṭheyya,
mil5.1.7:6.4_5: asuñño loko arahantehi assāti imamatthaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṁ,
mil5.1.7:7.1_1: siniddhasamasumajjitasappabhāsavimalādāsaṁ saṇhasukhumagerukacuṇṇena aparāparaṁ majjeyyuṁ, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil5.1.7:7.3_4: asuñño ca loko arahantehi assāti imamatthaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṁ,
mil5.1.7:8.4_2: paṭipattiyā antarahitāya sikkhāpadapaññatti antaradhāyati, liṅgaṁyeva tiṭṭhati,
mil5.1.7:8.4_3: liṅge antarahite paveṇupacchedo hoti, imāni kho, mahārāja, tīṇi antaradhānānī”ti.
